DepartmentsData.Title: Faculty of Arts & Humanities
DepartmentsData.Description: The Department of Arts & Humanities nurtures critical thinking, creativity, and cultural awareness through a variety of disciplines  including:English Literature ‚Äì Analyzing classical and contemporary works to enhance language and literary skills. Hindi & Urdu Studies ‚Äì Exploring poetry, prose, and linguistic heritage.History & Political Science ‚Äì Understanding historical events, governance, and international relations.

DepartmentsData.Title: Faculty of Science
DepartmentsData.Description: Our Science Department is equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories and research facilities to provide hands-on learning in Physics ‚Äì Studying mechanics, electromagnetism, and quantum theory. Chemistry ‚Äì Exploring organic, inorganic, and physical chemistry.

DepartmentsData.Title: Faculty of Commerce & Business Studies
DepartmentsData.Description: Preparing students for corporate, finance, and entrepreneurial success, this department offers: Accounting & Finance ‚Äì Teaching financial management, auditing, and taxation.

DepartmentsData.Title: mathematics Department
DepartmentsData.Description: The Mathematics Department in a secondary school plays a crucial role in building students‚Äô analytical and problem-solving skills. It covers fundamental and advanced topics to prepare students for higher education and real-world applications

DepartmentsData.Title: Physical Education Department
DepartmentsData.Description: The Physical Education Department focuses on the overall physical and mental well-being of students. It encourages fitness, teamwork, and discipline through sports and activities.

HighlightsData.Title: Academic & Career-Oriented Events
HighlightsData.Description: Workshops & Guest Lectures ‚Äì Renowned scholars, industry experts, and professionals conduct insightful sessions on topics like STEM, humanities, business, and technology.Annual Science & Innovation Fair ‚Äì A platform for students to showcase groundbreaking ideas, projects, and research.

HighlightsData.Title: Cultural Festivals & Talent Showcases
HighlightsData.Description: Gamesmeet at the Academy of Technology is an annual gathering focused on gaming and e-sports. It features competitive gaming tournaments, casual gaming sessions, and interactive workshops. Participants can compete in popular games, learn about game development, and connect with fellow gaming enthusiasts. The event aims to promote the gaming culture within the academy, encouraging both fun and educational experiences in the world of video games.

HighlightsData.Title: Sports & Wellness Activities
HighlightsData.Description: Annual Sports Meet üèÜ ‚Äì Students compete in athletics, relay races, badminton, volleyball, and table tennis. Inter-Collegiate Tournaments ‚Äì We participate in basketball, cricket, football, and chess competitions at the district and state levels.Yoga & Meditation Retreats ‚Äì Fostering mental well-being with certified yoga instructors and wellness experts.

HighlightsData.Title: Social Initiatives & Leadership Programs
HighlightsData.Description: Women Empowerment Sessions ‚Äì Discussions on gender equality, leadership, and self-growth led by influential speakers.Environmental Awareness Campaigns üå± ‚Äì Tree plantations, clean-up drives, and sustainability workshops..

CarrierAtAotData.Title: Flexible working hours
CarrierAtAotData.Description: Retired Professors recruited from premier institutes/ senior professionals from R & D organizations/ corporates may be considered for flexible working hours, i.e. 45 to 60 working days in a semester, @ 3 to 4 days per week considering 15 teaching weeks in a semester. Partially online teaching options may also be considered.

CarrierAtAotData.Title: Higher scale of pay:
CarrierAtAotData.Description: AOT provides competitive pay packages that exceed those for same positions in peer institutes. Assistant Professors with 6yrs of full time teaching/ research experience after M.Tech and registered for PhD, will be eligible for post of Assistant Professor [Senior Scale], compared to the 10yrs requirement in AICTE norms. Assistant Professors with 10yrs of full time teaching and research experience after M.Tech, already registered for PhD & with at least one publication in SCI indexed journals will be eligible for post of Assistant Professor [Selection Grade], which is highly flexible compared to AICTE norms.

CarrierAtAotData.Title: Career development opportunity
CarrierAtAotData.Description: Ample scope provided to engage in innovation and research in a vibrant and collaborative environment. Conducive atmosphere to develop your potential to the fullest and performance-based incentives. Mentoring by experiences academicians/ industry experts for new faculty.

CarrierAtAotData.Title: 360 degree support for research and publication:
CarrierAtAotData.Description: For all teaching posts, in addition to salary, incentives will be paid for career development, publication, patent, work on Govt. & industry sponsored project, attending conferences, faculty development programs, etc. as per institute norms. Dedicated research labs on Industry 4.0 technologies in the pipeline.
